Articles.Content: I wanted particle FX for the ion engine, so I installed HotRockets, the Ion engine worked, but any of the other engines don't have any. It's like the Particle FX are invisible or something.

As HotRockets isn't maintained and stock change the file pathes could be why your not getting them.

EDIT- Looking at the file don't know why there not showing the names are the same.

EDIT- Installed HotRockets in a test install and all the FX work.

Edited October 20, 2014 by Mecripp2
